entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 09:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning then changing to rain late in the morning then changing to freezing rain or ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches developing late in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
